mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_log(link_id, content, send_time) VALUES ((select link_id from chat_room_member_link where student_id = #{arg0} and chat_room_id = #{arg1}), #{arg2}, #{arg3})
INSERT INTO teacher_chat_log(content, send_time, chat_room_id) VALUES (#{arg2}, #{arg3}, #{arg1})
mapper.select: SELECT chat_log_id, chat_room_member_link.link_id, content, send_time, student_id FROM chat_log INNER JOIN (chat_room INNER JOIN chat_room_member_link on chat_room.chat_room_id = chat_room_member_link.chat_room_id ) on chat_room_member_link.link_id = chat_log.link_id where chat_room.chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId};

select teacher_chat_log_id, content, teacher_id, send_time, teacher_chat_log.chat_room_id from teacher_chat_log INNER JOIN chat_room cr on teacher_chat_log.chat_room_id = cr.chat_room_id where cr.chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId}

select content, send_time, student_id from chat_log INNER JOIN chat_room_member_link on chat_log.link_id = chat_room_member_link.link_id where chat_log.link_id in (select link_id from chat_room_member_link where student_id = #{arg0} and chat_room_id = #{arg1}) order by send_time desc limit 1
